name: Items of Adventure - The Serpent's Shadow
name_original: Items of Adventure - The Serpent's Shadow
description:
Who are the shadowy figures seeking The Serpent's Shadow and why do they seek it? Does the shadow cast by the staff truly move in the moonlight or is it a trick of your eyes? 

  • A detailed item description of The Serpent's Shadow, a mysterious staff to introduce into your campaign.
  • 3 story hook options to help introduce The Serpent's Shadow to the players. 
  • 3 plot thread options to spark ideas to further the story of The Serpent's Shadow.

The Items of Adventure series provides you, the gamemaster, with an engaging object to add to your world. Each product focuses on a unique item and provides a detailed description along with 3 story hooks and 3 plot threads to mix and match. These provide ready-made ways to introduce the item and spark ideas to further your story.
